            I am a bioinformatician with a passion for data analysis, evolution and education.
            My main expertise is turning diverse, complex and messy biological datasets into insights and knowledge.

articles.title: Dr Daria Rago
articles.contents:
Welcome to my personal website, a spot to collect together my research and interests.
If you have no time, click here to download my latest CV.
Otherwise, feel free to check out My Projects to see what I am working on, or visit my Publications to see my papers and presentations.
The fastest way to get in touch with me is via email at daria.rago [at] med.lu.se

articles.title: Publications
articles.contents:
Please note
I changed my legal name in 2022, hence my previous publication record has a different name.
First author publications
Rago, Alfredo, John H Werren, and John K Colbourne. 2020.
“Sex Biased Expression and Co-Expression Networks in Development, Using the Hymenopteran Nasonia Vitripennis.”
PLoS Genet 16(1): e1008518.https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pgen.1008518
Rago, Alfredo, Kostas Kouvaris, Tobias Uller, and Richard Watson. 2019.
“How Adaptive Plasticity Evolves When Selected Against.”
PLOS Computational Biology 15 (3): e1006260.https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pcbi.1006260.
Rago, Alfredo, and John Kenneth Colbourne. 2018.
“FESTA: Flexible Exon-Based Splicing and Transcription Annotation.”
bioRxiv, 300947.https://doi.org/10.1101/300947.
Rago, Alfredo, Donald G. Gilbert, Jeong-Hyeon Choi, Timothy B. Sackton, Xu Wang, Yogeshwar D. Kelkar, John H. Werren, and John K. Colbourne. 2016.
“OGS2: Genome Re-Annotation of the Jewel Wasp Nasonia Vitripennis.”
BMC Genomics 17 (1): 5303.https://doi.org/10.1186/s12864-016-2886-9.
Rago, Alfredo, Geoffrey M. While, and Tobias Uller. 2012.
“Introduction Pathway and Climate Trump Ecology and Life History as Predictors of Establishment Success in Alien Frogs and Toads.”
Ecology and Evolution 2 (7): 1437–45. https://doi.org/10.1002/ece3.261.
Others
Bornholdt, Jette, Christa Broholm, Yun Chen, Alfredo Rago, Stine Sloth, Jakob Hendel, Cathrine Melsæther, et al. 2020.
“Personalized B Cell Response to the Lactobacillus Rhamnosus GG Probiotic in Healthy Human Subjects: A Randomized Trial.”
Gut Microbes 12 (1): 1854639.https://doi.org/10.1080/19490976.2020.1854639.
Tobias Uller, Reinder Radersma, Nathalie Feiner, and Alfredo Rago. 2019. “Developmental Plasticity and Evolutionary Explanations.”
Evolution & Development.https://doi.org/10.1111/ede.12314.
Feiner, Nathalie, Alfredo Rago, Geoffrey M. While, and Tobias Uller. 2018.
“Developmental Plasticity in Reptiles: Insights from Temperature-Dependent Gene Expression in Wall Lizard Embryos.”
Journal of Experimental Zoology Part A: Ecological and Integrative Physiology 329 (6-7): 351–61. https://doi.org/10.1002/jez.2175.
Nathalie Feiner, Geoffrey M. While, Alfredo Rago, and Tobias Uller. 2018.
“Signatures of Selection in Embryonic Transcriptomes of Lizards Adapting in Parallel to Cool Climate.”
Evolution 72 (1): 67–81.https://doi.org/10.1111/evo.13397.
Jansen, M., A. N. Geerts, Alfredo Rago, K. I. Spanier, C. Denis, L. De Meester, and L. Orsini. 2017.
“Thermal Tolerance in the Keystone Species Daphnia Magna—a Candidate Gene and an Outlier Analysis Approach.”
Molecular Ecology 26 (8): 2291–2305.https://doi.org/10.1111/mec.14040.
Wang, Xu, David Wheeler, Amanda Avery, Alfredo Rago, Jeong-Hyeon Choi, John K. Colbourne, Andrew G Clark, and John H. Werren. 2013.
“Function and Evolution of DNA Methylation in Nasonia Vitripennis.”
PLoS Genetics 9 (10): e1003872.https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pgen.1003872.
